did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 400 items.

University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Clifton Waller Barrett, Accession # 6526-o, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of Mary Gilliam on 15 May 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers consist chiefly of financial documents regarding banking accounts, securities and stock holdings of Barrett, his wife, and sons. Most are personal although a few involve Barrett's steamship lines. The collection also contains family photographs including one of Barrett at an English Speaking Union luncheon, an address book, and a movie of the dedication of the Barrett Room in Alderman Library.
